title: What are some good books on Facebook poetry and prose? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a matter of fact, there aren’t much. You can log in to your Facebook and search prose and poetry and begin reading others timelines. But most of the time it is a hectic work and seems like stalking. So, I would suggest this book. The author collated all his FB timeline poetry and prose that he wrote for over 10 years. It is unconventional and unique book.
